name: Blog Post Generator Agent
description: Multi-agent content creation pipeline that transforms topics into complete content suites: research, blog post, LinkedIn post, and Twitter thread.
longDescription: Uses 4 specialized agents working in sequence: Research Agent (Exa search), Blog Writer Agent (SEO-optimized content), LinkedIn Agent (professional posts), and Twitter Agent (viral threads). Creates publication-ready content with citations.

businessImpact.keyMetric: Complete content suite from single topic input
